turkish_example_sentence: Sen o lezzetli ev yapımı pastayı yapmış olsaydın, misafirler çok mutlu olurdu
english_example_sentence: If you had made that delicious homemade cake, the guests would have been very happy
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты сделал тот вкусный домашний торт, гости были бы очень счастливы
